title: Clio Cup font? - HELP!
content:
Hi

Does anyone identify this font? Help would be very much appreciated! Thnks! (it is not the new Clio Cup 08 but previous)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [b3ac\_1.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208043027/http:/typophile.com/files/b3ac_1.JPG) | 6.86 KB |

 [‹ Does this font exist? Ruddigore???????](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208043027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41200 "Go to previous forum topic") [Retro font (Killing me!! AAAAAHHH!!!!) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208043027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41141 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zenna

comments.content: Probably custom designed like most wordmarks of this kind.

hi,

if you need it for a wordmark as well, simply build it yourself using some tweaked around paths and a thick outline -

it’s pretty simply to achieve..

probably a matter of minutes rather then hours; it does not look very elaborated..

if you need more letters, get your imagination going :)

if you need it as a font, good luck finding it - maybe someone else can help.. but probably those are custom designed letters for a wordmark. i agree with jan.

cheers,

steffen
